alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 1:12PM MDT until June 23 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Natrona County in central Wyoming... East central Fremont County in central Wyoming... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 112 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Moneta, which is also 19 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Moneta around 130 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
